name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Smash-Up
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Smash-Up is a fighting game for the Wii and PlayStation 2 video game consoles. It was developed by Game Arts in cooperation with Mirage Studios and released by Ubisoft in celebration of the 25th anniversary of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles franchise in 2009.
info:
• 中文名: 忍者神龟：毁灭
  • 平台: Wii
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: FTG
  • 游玩人数: 单人 / 多人
  • 发行日期: 2009年09月22日
  • 开发: Game Arts
  • 发行: Ubisoft
